designs.name: Modern Productive Home Office
designs.description: Clean and focused workspace designed for maximum productivity
designs.flooring: Wooden or laminate flooring with desk mat
designs.walls: Light grey walls with acoustic panels
designs.lighting: Task desk lamp, neutral LED ceiling lights
designs.furniture: Ergonomic work desk, adjustable chair, storage cabinet
designs.decor: Minimal wall art, indoor plant, cable management
designs.prompt_keywords: modern home office, productive study room, clean workspace

designs.name: Executive Luxury Study
designs.description: Premium executive-style office with rich materials and elegance
designs.decor: Framed art, desk accessories, statement clock
designs.prompt_keywords: executive home office, luxury study room, premium workspace

designs.name: Minimal Scandinavian Study
designs.description: Bright, clutter-free study with Scandinavian simplicity
designs.walls: White walls with soft wood accents
designs.furniture: Simple desk, wooden chair, open shelves
designs.prompt_keywords: scandinavian study room, minimal home office, light interiors

designs.name: Industrial Creative Workspace
designs.description: Urban industrial workspace designed for creative thinking
designs.walls: Exposed brick or textured concrete walls
designs.furniture: Metal desk, ergonomic chair, storage racks
designs.decor: Metal art, pin boards, vintage accessories
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial home office, creative workspace, urban study

designs.name: Classic Library Study
designs.description: Traditional study inspired by old-world libraries
designs.prompt_keywords: classic library study, traditional home office, timeless design

designs.name: Tech-Smart Home Office
designs.description: High-tech study with smart systems and automation
designs.flooring: Polished concrete or smart wood flooring
designs.walls: Matte white and grey walls with smart panels
designs.furniture: Motorized desk, ergonomic chair, cable-managed storage
designs.prompt_keywords: smart home office, tech study room, automated workspace

designs.name: Creative Art Studio Study
designs.description: Art-focused workspace encouraging creativity and expression
designs.furniture: Large work table, storage drawers, stool
designs.prompt_keywords: creative study room, art workspace, design studio

designs.name: Zen Focus Study Room
designs.description: Calm and distraction-free study inspired by zen principles
designs.walls: Soft beige or sage green walls
designs.prompt_keywords: zen study room, calm home office, focused workspace

designs.name: Compact Multifunction Study
designs.description: Space-saving study suitable for small homes
designs.furniture: Foldable desk, wall shelves, storage chair
designs.prompt_keywords: small home office, compact study room, space saving design

designs.name: Nature Biophilic Study
designs.description: Nature-connected study promoting wellness and productivity
designs.prompt_keywords: biophilic home office, nature inspired study, green workspace
